TopicTitle: [0.21][Parts Pack]Deep Space Mission Pack - Now open source!

Articles.Content:
I\'m not sure if I\'m doing something wrong or there\'s something about 0.15 of KSP, however, I can\'t seem to get my battery for the ion engine to recharge. I finally figured out how to get it to work / recharge in .144, however, with .15, the ion engine will work but never recharge.

If user error I\'d love to know what I\'m doing wrong. I have renamed 'Kreuzung.dll' to 'Zreuzung.dll', but still no luck.

Same problem here, renamed file, so now I can place the batteries and ion engines, but no recharge. My poor stranded kerbals!
The plugin is a bit buggy at the time, I made an update but someone said it doesn\'t work, I\'m jsut updating again. This is caused by a bug in the plugin loader, sorry.

What about making a small optional pack with the 2 centrifuges being powered by Multi-Joint Parts? The action key could be 'Z', that anyone uses in any plugin. =P

Adress of 'MJP':

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9017.0
I think I\'ve seen plugins using Z. Also, MJP no like .15 :\'(

Kreuzung, I\'m having a small problem... I had Cephei\'s plugin, and I updated the plugin and the pieces to match the latest release. But, the Ion Engine and Ion Battery says: Not available to KSP 1.5... Can you help me?
I think I packed the wrong MuMechLib in it. Get a new one and tell me if it works. (You have to save the link target I think)
It works ! Thanks Kreuzung ! I\'m glad that you\'ve made an update for your plugin
Yup, works again! ;D
Wait - does recharging the battery now work? Did I miss something?

Wait - does recharging the battery now work? Did I miss something?

Yes, newest version+Newest MuMechLib (included the wrong one).

However, I think l00 has updated his code after this again, so it might differ from the ZO2 panel behaviour (stupid word, spelled right?)...

Yes, newest version+Newest MuMechLib (included the wrong one).

However, I think l00 has updated his code after this again, so it might differ from the ZO2 panel behaviour (stupid word, spelled right?)...

Perfect, thanks!

Not sure if I missed out here, trying to get this mod installed on .15 but there are three parts which do not work, the batteries and the solar panels. They appear but are not able to be selected. I read through this forum several times to be clear, and you spoke of a Kreuzung.dll? Can\'t find this file anywhere.

Thanks for the help.
Link is in my sig. You need the old MechJeb (1.8.3 or so) until someone updates it, thats a dev fail and I can\'t access my laptop in the next weeks...

Here comes the time...

Version 15.2 and the parts and the plugin have stopped working.

So, is it just me or do we have to go back to version 15.0 ?

.15.2 broke this again?

I think can remember that a dev told me that plugins are not like Minecraft modding...

Yay, my exams are over, now I can work on this pack again. I\'m full of ideas, some things I\'m planning:


  • [li]Animated parts (solar panels, solar sail possibly)[/li]
    [li]Remodel/texture the old parts[/li]
    [li]More structural parts[/li]
    [li]More habitation modules (rotating centrifuges)[/li]

Yay, my exams are over, now I can work on this pack again. I\'m full of ideas, some things I\'m planning:


  • [li]Animated parts (solar panels, solar sail possibly)[/li]
    [li]Remodel/texture the old parts[/li]
    [li]More structural parts[/li]
    [li]More habitation modules (rotating centrifuges)[/li]

Nice! Can\'t wait to see what you come up with

I like the solar sail idea!! 8) 8)

IÂ´ve seen the film some weeks before where the Spacecraft is in.
If you need something added to the plugin, just ask me if it\'s possible. I really want to support this mod \'cause it\'s just awesome.
Really nice pack. Thanks guys 8)
This + Truss pack = Nerdgasm
The ion engine and battery both say that the are 'not compatible with this version of KSP'. I\'m using 15.2. Does it not work with 15.2?

Do you have my plugin? (Xenolith link in sig).

However, I can announce you that I removed the solar panels for the next version.

Yes, removed and I\'m not insane. I made new ones and of course I will remove new config files for this to stay playable.
So ive downloaded and installed, but when I launch and get in-game I can\'t use Ion engines and such. Why is this? (I have version 15.2)

Do you have my plugin?

The solar panel needs a new part.cfg now, I\'ll make one later.

Here it is.
